definition: to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
it is a pity/what a pity/unfortunately
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
to appear to be/to seem as if
